column6: Rogue lays battered and bruised and close to death! The X-Men must rush to save her life, but while trying to save their fallen teammate, Lady Mastermind might have unleashed a hidden danger that may threaten everyone on the planet!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
